text: The Rubyz is the debut album by the American Christian teen pop girl group, The Rubyz. The album was released on April 1, 2008, and tracks from the album, including "Outrageous," were featured on Radio Disney.Radio Disney | Artists| Incubator | The Rubyz | Bio go.com. Retrieved 03-29-2011. Additionally, the album peaked at No. 26 on the Christian Albums chart published by Billboard. ==Track listing== ==Music videos== *"Thirteen" ==Personnel== *Alexis Slifer - vocals *Cammie Hall - vocals *Marissa Milele - vocals ==References== ==External links== *Official Site *Jesus Freak Hideout *Radio Disney Category:2008 debut albums Category:The Rubyz albums
title: The Rubyz (album)
